name: uc-date-scraper
description: This is just a simple scraper for [this UofC schedule site](https://www.ucalgary.ca/pubs/calendar/current/academic-schedule.html), which I use to populate calendars with my [UofC Schedule to Google Calendar](http://schedule.blakemealey.ca) app.
author: Blake Mealey <blakemealey@gmail.com>
